availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Salmon Saxton Richardson (Meade County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Wimp Richardson in Meade County, Kentucky, on September 9, 1847. Father of George Richardson, Mary Richardson, Elizabeth Richardson, Eveline Richardson, Adelia Richardson, Kitty Richardson, and Daniel Richardson. Farmer in Meade County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Meade County in 1850. Farmer in Meade County in 1860. Owned twenty enslaved persons in Meade County in 1860.
